https://www.npmjs.com/package/@makemore/scaffold","o|t|u|1i|1j|1k|m|o","8a1b4769-296b-475d-bda0-e023ce20c47c","2026-01-14T15:56:43.651Z","o|t|u|1m|1n|x|m|o","be65991c-c0e5-4175-8881-ebf4eefe3026","0c1d7620-7eba-48ac-aa55-b38aedce067b","n|V8IGE4u","o|i|1p|1q|l|m|1R|1r|o","3dbc941b-ff76-4f40-bbb2-54dda9b691a5","2026-01-14T15:56:52.337Z","is that fixed everywhere!?","o|t|u|1t|1u|1v|m|o","e1693ad1-d8c4-42ea-b806-9b836b703042","2026-01-14T15:56:56.585Z","o|t|u|1x|1y|x|m|o","temp-fe-66ab894f-7d2b-4eb7-8601-c90d3f3cd1af","2026-01-14T15:57:06.197Z","o|t|u|20|21|x|1B|o","2b14b472-dfbc-4bab-a90f-7c8711a69433","2026-01-15T10:15:55.881Z","Make the API endpoint paths configurable in the chat widget with sensible defaults. Currently the widget has hardcoded paths like /api/accounts/anonymous-session/ and /api/agent-runtime/runs/.
Add the following new configuration options to DEFAULT_CONFIG:

// API endpoint paths (can be customized for different backend setups)
apiPaths: {
 anonymousSession: '/api/accounts/anonymous-session/',
 runs: '/api/agent-runtime/runs/',
 runEvents: '/api/agent-runtime/runs/{runId}/events/',
 simulateCustomer: '/api/agent-runtime/simulate-customer/',
},

Then update all the fetch calls and EventSource URLs to use these configurable paths instead of hardcoded strings. For example:
${config.backendUrl}/api/accounts/anonymous-session/ → ${config.backendUrl}${config.apiPaths.anonymousSession}
${config.backendUrl}/api/agent-runtime/runs/ → ${config.backendUrl}${config.apiPaths.runs}
${config.backendUrl}/api/agent-runtime/runs/${runId}/events/ → ${config.backendUrl}${config.apiPaths.runEvents.replace('{runId}', runId)}
This allows users to configure the widget for different backend URL structures. For example, a Django backend might use:

ChatWidget.init({
 backendUrl: '',
 agentKey: 'chat-agent',
 apiPaths: {
 anonymousSession: '/api/ai/agent/anonymous-session/',
 runs: '/api/ai/agent/runs/',
 runEvents: '/api/ai/agent/runs/{runId}/events/',
 },
});
Make sure to deep-merge the apiPaths config so users only need to override the paths they want to change, keeping the defaults for the
